title: Kindai Nihon Bungaku Meisakusen
sinopse: Ryôichi Ikegami's compilation of stories adapted from literary works by five Japanese writers: Jigokuhen (Akutagawa, Ryuunosuke), Osei Toujou (Rampo, Edogawa), Tojuro no Koi (Kikuchi, Kan), Matsukaze no Mon (Yamamoto, Shoguro), Tenshu Monogatari (Izumi, Kyoka).
